about_the_game:
Take control of a Turtle in a game of Football in this First Person Shooter. Use your gun for movement and to shoot the ball around.

Turtle Champs is an online multiplayer game where you and your friends can duke it out in the Football field to see who is the true Turtle Champion. Your weapon is your best friend. Use the pistol to either shoot the ball, launch your opponents or fly around the field at great speeds. You get 5 minutes on the clock to score more goals than your opponents.

Gameplay:

Play for 5 minutes to see which team can score the most goals. This game is intended to appeal to the casual audience who just want a free game to play with their online friends. Please do not take this game too seriously... it's literally Turtle Football with guns

Your Weapon:

For the default game mode, you are given 9 bullets for your pistol. You can shoot either 1 or 3 bullets at a time depending on what you need. Your gun only reloads while on the ground but aerial movement will let you hit the ball before your opponents. This can allow more skilled players to have an advantage over new players.

The Field:

There are 3 maps: Forest, Beach and Space. These maps are purely aesthetic have no difference in gameplay.
The field is large as players have more range with their weapons and can move quickly. Because players have long range, there is a small goal located above the large one. This goal is a 3 pointer whereas the bottom large goal is only 1 point. While it might be difficult to hit, it can separate good players from great players.

The Experience:

Turtle Champs puts the players first. Though the game is recommended to be played on the Default settings, we give players the freedom of playing how they want to play. (up to 8 players is supported but we recommend no more than 4 for ping reasons)

The F2P Model:

Turtle Champs includes NO pay to win features. The entire game is free except for the Cosmetic Pass which is available to purchase. The Cosmetic Pass is a DLC content that can be purchased that allows players to add a topper onto their shell or change the skin of your weapon. Other players will be able to see these changes.
